thread.title: Gigi Hadid walks through snowy New York
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid walks through snowy New York | Daily Mail Online

author: Eve Buckland For Mailonline
title: Gigi Hadid walks through snowy New York
text:
As a supermodel she's used to walking on an array of strange catwalks in a host of daring outfits.
And Gigi Hadid proved that any surface really is a runway as she braved the snowy New York streets after her successful turn in designer Jeremy Scott's Autumn-Winter 2017 show.
The Californian clothes horse sported her final runway look on the pavement as she made a stylish sartorial statement in a neon pink cropped tee, with soft blush cargo trousers and nude ankle boots.
Scroll down for video
Ready to go: Following the show, Gigi sported her final look straight off the catwalk onto the street as she proved that the collection is truly ready-to-wear
She protected herself from the elements with a fawn belted coat and covered her eyes with red John Lennon-inspired shades.
Draped across her shoulder was an ivory handbag which perfectly complemented her scarlet manicure.
Despite below freezing temperatures, Gigi showed it's never to nippy to make a style statement with her taut tummy on display.
Fashion fiend: The style maven was happy to display her toned tummy in the hot pink cropped tee, despite the plummeting temperatures and snow covered pavements in the Big Apple
So stylish: During rehearsal, the 21-year-old wore sunglasses with a pink crop top and a camel trench coat
Go bold in pink like Gigi in Jeremy Scott Jeremy Scott AW17 pink sweater
Unavailable olie - click to browse current collection
Buy now
Gigi has been busy walking catwalks left, right and centre at Fashion Week and she continued her style parade on to the pavement, by wearing her top - to - toe Jeremy Scott ensemble post-show too!
The model stepped out in the snow wearing the same look she flaunted on the runway. Merging sporty joggers and a sweatshirt with a classic belted trench and heels, the star showed us all how to work the sports luxe trend for 2017. As her outfit is from the AW17 collection, you won’t be able to buy it just yet but click right to browse the current range.
Or recreate her look minus the designer price tag with one of the bold pink buys below. Wear yours low key with gym style bottoms and sneakers by day, and then switch up your flats for heels to give your pink piece an evening feel like Gigi.

Her genetically blessed younger brother Anwar chivalrously lent a helping hand to his sister as she took on the tricky task of navigating ice in vertiginous heels.
The pair recently joined forces for a stunning editorial for British Vogue.
The 21-year-old is in the Big Apple for New York Fashion Week and is riding on a wave of success with the launch of her second collection for Tommy Hilfiger.
Helping hand: She covered her lithe limbs in Scott's stylish cream joggers as her brother Anwar, 17, aided her high heeled frame from their car
Sibling love: Gigi's younger brother was a true gentleman as he held onto his sister as they got out of their car
Meanwhile, Gigi stopped by The Ellen DeGeneres Show for the first time, gushing about her amorous relationship with 24-year-old pop star Zayn Malik .
'We actually met at a friend's birthday party a few years ago. Then, he was in New York to come to the Victoria's Secret show... and ended up not coming.
'I was like, "I'll play it cool, I'll go to the after party." He wasn't there,' Hadid confessed, laughing, 'And then later that week, we ended up going on our first date.
Ellen then prodded: 'Was he playing it cool like you were playing it cool?'
'We played it cool for like ten minutes, and then I was like, "You're really cute,"' Gigi divulged, continuing, 'We connected, like, really quickly.'
Power couple: Gigi gushed about her passionate romance with former One Direction star Zayn Malik, and said the pair connected immediately
